member.name: T:CaptainCoder.Core.UnityEngine.IHasGuid
member.summary: The interface provides a single string property representing a unique id. By default, this interface provides an implementation of that will automatically generate a Guid on serialization if one has not been specified.

member.name: M:CaptainCoder.Core.UnityEngine.IHasGuid.RegenerateGuid
member.summary: Regenerates the Guid for this object
